name: Virtual Reality Multiplayer Crossplay PC, Oculus Rift/Quest2 Standalone and Linked
name_original: Virtual Reality Multiplayer Crossplay PC, Oculus Rift/Quest2 Standalone and Linked
description:
ZOSU Studios LLC is an independent (indie) studio.  This game was created as a test game for Rift and PC crossplay, potentially expandable to crossplay with mobile and other devices.  This game will function with PC play only but was designed for the Oculus Rift / Quest2-PCVR as a test.  As this is only a test the multiplayer functionality might stop working at anytime.  

Terms and Conditions

This game cannot be reproduced or redistributed without permission.  Review videos are acceptable.  By downloading this you are agreeing that you are using these files at your own risk and will not hold ZOSU Studios LLC liable for any harm to you or your devices by downloading and using this software and that this is a test game that might not work properly.
